      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getImmediateProb(Action act, Observation ob)
      Returns the probability of seeing a particular observation given that a particular action is taken.

      Returns the probability of seeing a sequence of observations given that a particular sequence of actions is taken.

      Returns the probability of seeing a specified action-observation pair k steps in the future.

    • Method Detail

      • getImmediateProb

        double getImmediateProb(Action act,
                      Observation ob)
        Returns the probability of seeing a particular observation given that a particular action is taken.
        Parameters:
        act - The next action to be taken.
        ob - The observation.
        Returns:
        The probability of seeing observation after taking action.

      • getImmediateProb

        double getImmediateProb(java.util.ArrayList<Action> acts,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Observation> obs)
        Returns the probability of seeing a sequence of observations given that a particular sequence of actions is taken.
        Parameters:
        acts - The list of actions.
        obs - The list of observations.
        Returns:
        The probability associated with this test.

      • getKStepPredictionProb

        double getKStepPredictionProb(Action act,
                            Observation ob,
                            int k)
        Returns the probability of seeing a specified action-observation pair k steps in the future.
        Parameters:
        act - An action.
        ob - An observation.
        k - Steps ahead to predict.
        Returns:
        Probability of action occuring k-steps in future.

      • getKStepPredictionProb

        double getKStepPredictionProb(java.util.ArrayList<Action> acts,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Observation> obs,
                            int k)
        Returns the probability of seeing a specified test k steps in the future.
        Parameters:
        acts - A vector of actions.
        obs - A vector of observations.
        k - Steps ahead to predict.
        Returns:
        Probability of action occurring k-steps in future.
